titleStmt.title: An elegie humbly offered to the memory of that matchless wit, and unparallel'd example of sincere penitency, the right honorable John Earl of Rochester, who most piously exchanged earthly honour for never-fading glory the 26th day of July, 1680.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Samuel, gent.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "No more, wild atheists! No more deny".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
